#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000
#define SIZE 25
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int i,n;
	long long re=0;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		re+=i*(n/i);
	}
	cout<<re<<endl;
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
